Ancestry-Ratfolk -- Male Tunnel Rat Fighter
Strength: +0 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +1 Intelligence: +1 Wisdom: +1 Charisma: +2
Background: Tinker Deity: Nethys
Experience: 902/1000 Level: 1 Speed: 25 Size: Small Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 5/10
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 4 from any)
Desert Rat: Has 30' Speed on all fours
Tunnel Rat: Moves normally through snug spaces
Warren Digger: Has a 15' burrow Speed
Features/Skills

Deep Rat: Has the Darkvision feature

Ratfolk Lore: Has the Additional Lore (Ratfolk Lore) feature
Tunnel Rat: Has the Quick Squeeze feature
Uncanny Cheeks: Has the Prescient Consumable and Prescient Planner features
Cheek Pouches: Can store 1 Bulk of items in cheeks
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Pack Rat: Can store 50% extra Bulk in containers
Prescient Consumable: Can retrieve an undeclared consumable from backpack once per shopping trip
Prescient Planner: Can retrieve an undeclared piece of adventuring gear from backpack once per shopping trip
Ratspeak: Can speak with rodents
Perception: +6 (wisdom; expert)

Shadow Rat: Skill Trained (Intimidation)

Warren Navigator: Skill Trained (Survival)
Longsnout Rat: Has 30' imprecise scent, and gains +2 Perception to Seek using scent
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze 5' per rd, or 10' per rd on a critical success
Shadow Rat: Initial attitude of encountered animals is 1 step worse than normal; can use Intimidation to Coerce them and suffers no Demoralize penalty for lacking a shared language with them
Skittering Sneak: Can Sneak at full Speed
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on a selected type of item
Tinkering Fingers: Suffers no Crafting penalty to Repair an item without a toolkit, and gains +1 with a toolkit
Warren Navigator: Improves Sense Direction check results by 1 degree, and suffers no penalty from having no compass
Combat
Hit Points: 17 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 17 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Buckler (+1 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 6) Weapons: Crossbow (+9 1d8 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Hatchet (+5 1d6 S R10'; strength; expert); Jaws (+9 1d6 P; dexterity; expert); Sickle (+9 1d4 S; dexterity; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Sharp Teeth: Jaws inflict 1d4 HP piercing
Shinstabber: Has increased Overcrowd effects
Vicious Incisors: Jaws inflict 1d6 HP piercing
Combat Assessment: (1) Melee Strike allows an immediate Recall Knowledge about the target; a critical hit gives a +2 bonus
Cornered Fury: Critical hit by a larger foe leaves it off-guard vs. self for 1 rd
Overcrowd: Can end movement in the same square as an ally
Quick Stow: (F) Stows an item in cheek pouches once per rd
Ratfolk Roll: (2) Rolls 100' per rd down an incline; after the 1st rd, suffers slowed 2 and inflicts and suffers 4d6 HP bludgeoning if stopped by an obstacle
Reactive Strike: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +9 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Desert Rat: Treats environmental heat as 1 step less extreme but environmental cold as 1 step more extreme without protection, and can last 10x as long as normal without food and water
Lab Rat: +1 vs. disease and poison, and successes vs. disease and poison are critical successes
Sewer Rat: Immune to putrid plague, +1 vs. disease and poison, and successes vs. disease and poison are critical successes
Snow Rat: Has cold resistance 1 and treats environmental cold as 1 step less extreme
Warren Navigator: Improves save results vs. Quandary by 1 degree
Magic
Attack: Primal Innate: +5 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Primal Innate: 15 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Animal Messenger (P2): (1 min) R120' Target Tiny animal carries a small object or note to a specified destination for up to 24 hr
Enlarge (P2): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Large, gaining +5' reach, +2 melee damage, and clumsy 1 for 5 min (heightened 4th target becomes Huge, gaining +10' reach and +4 melee damage; 8th affects 10 creatures)
Magic Notes:
Greater Than The Sum: Knows the Enlarge primal innate spell; can cast it at 6th rank once per day
Rat Magic: Knows the Animal Messenger primal innate spell; can cast it once per day
Call The Swarm: (3) R120' Rats swarming a 30' burst inflict on foes difficult terrain, 6d8 HP piercing initially, and 3d6 HP piercing per rd for 1 min once per day
Rat Form: (1) Becomes a Tiny rat for 10 min
